    # Sum all the digits in the string

    else:

    # Check if the total is divisible by 10

def validate(n):
    digits = [int(x) for x in str(n)]  # Convert the number to a list of digits
    if len(digits) % 2 == 0:  # Check if there are an even number of digits
        digits = [2 * digits[i] if i % 2 == 0 else digits[i] for i in range(len(digits))]  # Double every other digit
    else:
        digits = [digits[i] if i % 2 == 0 else 2 * digits[i] for i in range(len(digits))]  # Double every other digit
    digits = [x - 9 if x > 9 else x for x in digits]  # Replace digits greater than 9 with the sum of their digits
    return sum(digits) % 10 == 0  # Check if the sum of all digits is divisible by 10

def validate(n):

def validate(n):
    digits = [int(d) for d in str(n)]
    # Double every other digit, starting from the second digit from the right
    for i in range(len(digits) - 2, -1, -2):

        if digits[i] > 9:
            digits[i] -= 9
    # Sum all of the final digits
    total = sum(digits)

    return total % 10 == 0

def validate(n):

def validate(n):
